computer_extension_attribute.name: Outlook_Version
computer_extension_attribute.description: Reports the installed version of Microsoft Outlook for Mac

input_type.script:
#!/bin/sh if [ -d /Applications/Microsoft\ Outlook.app ]; then AppVersion=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Applications/Microsoft\ Outlook.app/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString` echo "<result>$AppVersion</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
exit 0
